name: A nameless project
description:
You entered pudding's secret liar :O  Pudding's liar, now updated, check devlog for more info.

Game made with trial MZ, fully RTP and deleted all SF files.

Made for RTP Only Jam and Trials of MZ (Yes, I made this game within 1 week timeframe because I hate myself. Ey, vote for me on both pages if u like the game! Don't vote anyone else on both pages!) 

Also yes, I submitted this one game to two game jams, sue me.
